## Matrix.RotationYawPitchRollToRef() method

Creates a rotation matrix and stores it in a given matrix

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static RotationYawPitchRollToRef(yaw: number, pitch: number, roll: number, result: Matrix): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  yaw | <code>number</code> | defines the yaw angle in radians (Y axis) |
|  pitch | <code>number</code> | defines the pitch angle in radians (X axis) |
|  roll | <code>number</code> | defines the roll angle in radians (X axis) |
|  result | <code>Matrix</code> | defines the target matrix |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
